com.barclaycard.theatersolve

Class Theater

  • Object
    • Theater

  • public class Theater
extends Object
    Holds the dimensions of a theater (by sections) and maintains available seat count

    • Method Summary

      void addSection(int row, int section, int size)
      Adds a section

      Accessor for current seating capacity of the theater
      ArrayList<Section> getSections()
      Accessor for sections in the theater
      void increaseSeatsRemaining(Section section, int increase)
      Called when a prior-filled order is being moved closer to the stage, to increase the older section's available seating.
      ArrayList<Section> sortSectionsByCapacity()
      Sort the sections by capacity and row
      ArrayList<Section> sortSectionsByPosition()
      Sort the sections by row and column

        Parameters:

        reduction - the modification amount

      • increaseSeatsRemaining

        public void increaseSeatsRemaining(Section section,
                                   int increase)
        Called when a prior-filled order is being moved closer to the stage, to increase the older section's available seating.
        Parameters:
        section - the section being modified
        increase - the modification amount
